email_step_description: Please provide your correct email address
personal_information_step_description: Please provide your correct full name
password_hint: Password must be at least 8 characters, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_skip_filling_da: Are you sure you want to skip filling in this information?
skip_filling_data_description: The following information is optional and can be skipped if not needed. Are you sure you want to proceed?
we_send_a_verify_code_to: We send a verify code to:
verify_your_account_description: The verification code sent to your email
your_account_has_been_activated_descript: Your account is now active. Enjoy full access to all features!
welcome_to_word_wizards_description: Join the fun with Word Wizards! Connect with others, challenge your vocabulary, and guess the words to win!
welcome_back_please_enter_your_details: Welcome back! Please enter your details!
page_not_found_description: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exits or has been removed. Here are some helpful links:
forgot_password_description: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions?
check_your_instructions_description: We have sent you reset instructions to your email.
password_reset_successfully_description: Your password has been reset successfully! Click below to log in magically.
create_a_new_password_description: Enter a password that hasn't been used before.
